about.hero_subtitle: A journey of passion, tradition, and the love of baking that brings joy to every home
about.story_paragraph1: Gurudev Bakery was founded with a simple dream: to bring the warmth and joy of freshly baked goods to every family. What started as a small neighborhood bakery has grown into a beloved community institution.
about.story_paragraph2: For over two decades, we have been committed to preserving traditional baking methods while embracing innovation. Our recipes have been perfected over time, combining age-old techniques with modern flavors.
about.story_paragraph3: Today, we continue to honor our roots while serving our community with the same dedication and passion that inspired us from the very beginning.
about.mission_description: To create moments of joy and connection through exceptional baked goods, made with the finest ingredients and crafted with care. We believe that every product we bake has the power to bring people together and create lasting memories.
about.values_subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We never compromise on the quality of our ingredients or our baking process. Every product meets our highest standards.

fresh.title: Always Fresh
fresh.description: Everything is baked fresh daily, ensuring you get the best taste and texture in every bite.

community.title: Community Focus
community.description: We're more than a bakery – we're part of your community, supporting local suppliers and events.

excellence.title: Pursuit of Excellence
excellence.description: We constantly refine our recipes and techniques to deliver exceptional products that exceed expectations.

tradition.title: Honoring Tradition
tradition.description: Our recipes honor time-tested baking traditions while embracing modern tastes and preferences.

trust.title: Built on Trust
trust.description: Transparency and integrity in everything we do has earned us the trust of generations of customers.
